pullrequest.title: [Blueprint] Log record SDF to ign-transport database file

content.raw: We should target this change to Blueprint since it will make previously recorded Acropolis logs unplayable. We should also document this change in `Migration.md`.  If people come complaining that they want to playback their Acropolis logs on Blueprint we can always adapt later to be backwards compatible, or provide a conversion mechanism.
content.html: We should target this change to Blueprint since it will make previously recorded Acropolis logs unplayable. We should also document this change in Migration.md. If people come complaining that they want to playback their Acropolis logs on Blueprint we can always adapt later to be backwards compatible, or provide a conversion mechanism.
